reviewText: My man is a huge Luscious Lopez fan so I picked htis up for him as a stocking stuffer.  Usually with adult flicks we watch do our thing and put it away.  This one was different...we watched, did our then then finished the movie and (luckily for me) did our thing again!  it has great scenes and the voices are so funny.  I know he enjoyed it...and from a females stand point, I enjoyed it too.  We even showed the out takes at the end to some friends when they came over.  I wish more adult films had out takes in them.  If you are into comedy and like to have fun with your sex...this is a great flick to pick up.
This movie is not your average jerk flick. America Loves Bush is as funny as it is hot. You don't have to hate George W to enjoy this movie (but it does help). Looking forward to the next release.
